text: Parthira jiranara udaharana panira darae yito ami akasara paraa barsana karao, iyara dbaraa bhumija udbhida ghana sannibista hai utpanna haya, yibora manuhe arau jira-janturae khaya. Tara pichata yetiya bhumi sujala-suphala arau manomoha hai uthe arau tara giraihamte bharae ye, se'ibora sihamtara ayattadhina, tetiya dinate ha'omka ba raatiye amara adesa ahi parae, tara pichata ami se'ito enekai nirmula karai di'om yeniba yoraa kali'o iyara kono astitba nachila. E'idarae ami ayatasamuha bisadabharae barnana karao ene eta sampradayara babe yisakale cinta-carca karae
